title: Park It Outside: BMW Issues Recall After Cars Catch Fire While Off
description: Some automotive recalls are so massive they're hard to comprehend. Ford once had to fix more than 20 million transmissions in the 1980s, and the Takata airbag crisis eventually affected approximately 100 million cars worldwide. BMW's newest recall looks small next to those giants – just under ...
titleSummary: "BMW Owners Left in Flames as Vehicle Fires Spark Widespread Recall"
descriptionSummary: A recent BMW recall, though significant, pales in comparison to other automotive crises. In the 80s, Ford had a staggering 20 million transmissions to repair, while the Takata airbag scandal impacted around 100 million vehicles globally.

title: This Hellcat Upgrade Makes the Plymouth Prowler Into the Car It Should Always Have Been
description: The Plymouth Prowler might be one of the most frustrating “what-if” stories in the automotive world. descriptionSummary: The Plymouth Prowler is an enigmatic roadster that tantalizes with its sleek design and retro flair, yet falls short due to a underwhelming powertrain and outdated transmission, leaving enthusiasts wondering what could have been if things had been different.

title: How to Spot Deadly Fake Airbags Before They Turn Into Grenades
description: Federal safety investigators have identified key warning signs that can help you detect counterfeit Chinese airbags before they kill you. The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration believes these deadly airbags contain faulty inflators from Jilin Province Detiannuo Safety Technology, ...

descriptionSummary: Federal traffic regulators have pinpointed critical indicators to identify fake Chinese-made airbags, which are suspected of harboring defective inflators manufactured by a company in China's Jilin province.

title: Toyota Starlet Reported To Return In 2027 as Lightweight Rally Hatch

description: Swedish automaker Koenigsegg has set new standards for performance, design, and engineering ingenuity over the last 20 to 30 years. descriptionSummary: Koenigsegg has redefined performance and style with its groundbreaking vehicles over three decades. This Swedish luxury car maker crafts exceptional works of automotive art that tantalize high-end collectors, but remain an unattainable dream for many enthusiasts.

descriptionSummary: Bosch, a leading international auto parts supplier, is embarking on significant restructuring efforts. The company plans to reduce its global workforce by around 13,000 positions, approximately 3%, over the next decade in an effort to revamp operations and stay competitive.

title: BMW Says Sedans Aren’t Going Anywhere, Despite SUV Takeover

descriptionSummary: In recent years, the sedan's popularity has waned in favor of SUVs, prompting several manufacturers to abandon their car lines for more lucrative models. However, BMW remains committed to its sedans, as evidenced by ongoing design efforts.
